enb_long_title: Thirteenth Session of the Subsidiary Bodies of the UNFCCC
sentences: In Plenary on the afternoon of Friday, 15 September, delegates adopted the draft report of SBSTA-13 (FCCC/SBSTA/2000/L.5).
Burkina Faso, for the Africa Group, emphasized the need for the translation and wide dissemination of technical reports.
In his closing remarks, Chair Dovland noted that while progress had been made, it was not as much as he had hoped for.
He highlighted the need for delegates to reconsider their positions if COP-6 is to be a success.
He gaveled the meeting to a close at 1:05 pm.
